mojito.name: Mojito
mojito.short: Refreshing cocktail with mint, lime and rum.
mojito.description: A refreshing cocktail made with fresh mint, lime and rum. Light, aromatic and perfectly balanced with a crisp citrus note.

pina_colada.name: Pina Colada
pina_colada.short: Sweet tropical cocktail with pineapple and coconut.
pina_colada.description: A sweet and creamy cocktail made with pineapple, coconut and rum. A tropical classic with smooth texture and summer flavor.

aperol_spritz.name: Aperol Spritz
aperol_spritz.short: Aperitif with Aperol, Prosecco and soda.
aperol_spritz.description: A refreshing and lightly bitter aperitif made with Aperol, Prosecco and soda water. Sparkling, vibrant and perfect for warm days.

margarita.name: Margarita
margarita.short: Classic cocktail with tequila and lime.
margarita.description: A classic margarita made with tequila, fresh lime juice and orange liqueur. Bold, refreshing and iconic.

sex_on_the_beach.name: Sex on the Beach
sex_on_the_beach.short: Fruity cocktail with peach liqueur and vodka.
sex_on_the_beach.description: A fruity cocktail combining peach liqueur, vodka, orange juice and cranberry. Sweet, light and very aromatic.

cosmopolitan.name: Cosmopolitan
cosmopolitan.short: Vodka cocktail with lime and cranberry.
cosmopolitan.description: An elegant cocktail made with vodka, lime juice, triple sec and cranberry juice. Fresh, slightly sour and beautifully vibrant in color.
